title: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo 13.5 Fl Oz
description: Go back to that Amazing Hair Day. Enter a world of botanical bliss. Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Shampoo's formula will unleash the power of your naturally beautiful hair. Embracing you like a meadow of fresh flowers, this luxurious shampoo has a blend of rose hips, jojoba and vitamin E extracts. This shampoo cleans to reveal natural shine and takes your hair to a place its never been before. Herbal Lore: Ancient Greeks believed roses became red from the blood of Aphrodite, who pricked her foot on a thorn trying to save her beloved Adonis.

title: Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Conditioner 13.5 Fl Oz
description: Go Back to that Amazing Hair Day. Go deeper into a world of botanical bliss. Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Conditioner's formula will unleash the power of your naturally beautiful hair. Embracing you like a meadow of fresh flowers, this luxurious conditioner has a blend of rose hips, jojoba and Vitamin E extracts. This conditioner will take your hair to a place its never been before. This formula works to: Lavish every strand with essential conditioning ingredients, Enhance silkiness, suppleness and manageability and Leave hair luminous and sensuously smooth. Herbal Lore: Jojoba oil is a natural oil made from the seeds of the jojoba plant and has been used for centuries as a natural remedy.

title: CoverGirl Trublend Minerals Pressed Powder, Translucent Fair 1,  0.39-Ounce
description: Silky-smooth formula adapts to your skin tone for a natural, no-makeup look. Specially designed to work with TruBlend foundation, blush and concealer; select your powder, 1 - 6, then look for the corresponding foundation, blush and concealer!
